ApiVersion.description: API level selected by the process (ex: 710, 730, ...). Must be supported by the native library that is deployed alongside the application.

Root.description: Path to the Subspace or Partition that will be the root of all keys accessible to the application. Ex: '/Staging/MyAwesomeApp'

NativeLibraryPath.description: Path to the native client library that will be used to connect to the cluster. Must be accessible from the process.
